B

Bandwidth - Variable in class pgrid.Statistics
The bandwidth.
BandwidthUncompr - Variable in class pgrid.Statistics
The uncompressed bandwidth.
BEHIND_FIREWALL - Static variable in class pgrid.Properties
Property "BehindFirewall", if this host is behind a firewall.
bootstrap(PGridHost) - Method in class pgrid.core.maintenance.MaintenanceManager
Adds the given host to the list of bootstrap hosts.
BOOTSTRAP_CONSTRUCTION_DELAY - Static variable in class pgrid.Constants
The delay before peers start constructing the network.
BOOTSTRAP_HOSTS - Static variable in class pgrid.Properties
Property "BootstrapHosts", the used bootstrap hosts.
BOOTSTRAP_REPLICATION_DELAY - Static variable in class pgrid.Constants
The delay before peers replicate their data.
BootstrapMessage - Class in pgrid.network.protocol
This class represents a P-Grid bootstrap message.
BootstrapMessage(MessageHeader) - Constructor for class pgrid.network.protocol.BootstrapMessage
Creates a new PGridP2P Exchange message with the given header.
BootstrapMessage(PGridHost) - Constructor for class pgrid.network.protocol.BootstrapMessage
Creates a new exchange with given values for bootstrapping.
BootstrapMessage(PGridHost, XMLRoutingTable) - Constructor for class pgrid.network.protocol.BootstrapMessage
Creates a new exchange with given values for bootstrapping.
BootstrapReplyMessage - Class in pgrid.network.protocol
This class represents a P-Grid bootstrap reply message.
BootstrapReplyMessage(MessageHeader) - Constructor for class pgrid.network.protocol.BootstrapReplyMessage
Creates a new PGrid bootstrap reply message with the given header.
BootstrapReplyMessage(PGridHost, XMLRoutingTable) - Constructor for class pgrid.network.protocol.BootstrapReplyMessage
Creates a new bootstrap reply with given values for bootstrapping.
BootstrapReplyMessage(PGridHost, XMLRoutingTable, long, long) - Constructor for class pgrid.network.protocol.BootstrapReplyMessage
Creates a new bootstrap reply with given values for bootstrapping.
BoundedHashtable - Class in pgrid.util
The Bounded Hashtable is a FIFO queue bounded to a given amount of elements.
BoundedHashtable() - Constructor for class pgrid.util.BoundedHashtable
Creates a new bounded queue with the default capacity.
BoundedHashtable(int) - Constructor for class pgrid.util.BoundedHashtable
Creates a new bounded queue with the given capacity.
BoundedVector - Class in pgrid.util
The Bounded Vector is a FIFO queue bounded to a given amount of elements.
BoundedVector() - Constructor for class pgrid.util.BoundedVector
Creates a new bounded queue with the default capacity.
BoundedVector(int) - Constructor for class pgrid.util.BoundedVector
Creates a new bounded queue with the given capacity.
broadcast() - Method in class pgrid.util.WorkerThread
Notifies the internal lock Object.
BUILD - Static variable in class pgrid.Constants
The build version of this application.
bytesToBinaryString(byte[]) - Static method in class pgrid.util.Converter
Returns a binary string represantation of an array of bytes.
bytesToBinaryString(byte[], int, int) - Static method in class pgrid.util.Converter
Returns a binary string represantation of an array of bytes.
bytesToHexString(byte[], int, int) - Static method in class pgrid.util.Converter
Returns a string represantation of an array of bytes.
bytesToHexString(byte[], int, int, StringBuffer) - Static method in class pgrid.util.Converter
Converts an array of bytes to a string represantation with hexadecimal chars.
